summary.intent: Fix lint and test failures caused by a signature change to the InitializeSession function.
summary.outcome: Updated all 4 call sites in phase_prepare_commit_msg_test.go to match the new InitializeSession signature, adding agent.AgentTypeClaudeCode as the second parameter and an empty transcriptPath string. All tests and linting now pass.

repo: InitializeSession signature was updated to require (sessionID string, agentType agent.AgentType, transcriptPath string, userPrompt string)
The agent package defines AgentType constants like AgentTypeClaudeCode
Project follows CLAUDE.md workflow: fmt, lint, then test

code.finding: Test had 4 InitializeSession calls that needed updating from 3-arg to 4-arg signature with agent.AgentTypeClaudeCode

workflow: When function signatures change, grep for call sites to identify all places needing updates
Verify edits by re-reading the file after bulk replacements to catch any issues

friction: Stale diagnostics initially showed errors that had already been fixed
